meanings.definition: Frontenises (noun): the plural form of frontenis, a sport similar to tennis played on a fronton.
meanings.sent1: In frontenises, players hit the ball against the front wall.
meanings.sent2: They enjoy playing frontenises on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The frontenises match was intense and exciting.
meanings.sent4: Her skills in frontenises are as sharp as a sword.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the ball hitting the wall echoes in frontenises.

meanings.definition: Frontenises (verb): third person singular present of frontenis, to play frontenis.
meanings.sent1: He frontenises with his friends every Saturday.
meanings.sent3: Frontenising in the rain added an unexpected challenge.
meanings.sent4: The way he frontenises shows his dedication and passion.
meanings.sent5: Frontenising under the sun feels energizing and fun.
